feed.title: Combined summary - [announce] gobtc -- Bitcoin library and reference client in Go programming language

entry.title: Combined summary - [announce] gobtc -- Bitcoin library and reference client in Go programming language
entry.summary: Dawid Ciężarkiewicz has created a project called gobtc, which aims to develop an adaptable FLOSS Bitcoin peer implementation. The objective of this project is to facilitate people's direct participation in the Bitcoin network through their applications. The goBTC project is available on GitHub at http://github.com/dpc/gobtc. Dawid shared his post on bitcoin-dev and go-nuts mailing lists. For those unfamiliar with Bitcoin or Go language, they can refer to Bitcoin.org and Golang.org. According to Dawid, Go language is perfect for writing efficient networking applications as it provides built-in standard library support for many technologies used in Bitcoin. He encourages interested individuals to contact him regarding participation and even mentions having already been in touch with someone willing to share some working code.
